Gloss: spirits of the dead, which go to Tuma Island and dwell there

not
Gala anukwali. - I do not know.

maternal uncle (mother's brother)
kadala ― his maternal uncle
hearthstone; three or four stones which are placed round a fireplace in order to support cooking pots etc.
ghost; an immortal aspect of the dead, which did not go to Tuma Island and scares living people by playing tricks on them

to leave, to go
kula - thou goest
kulosi - ye go
bala - I will go

to know
Gala anukwali.
I do not know (it).
ceremonial distribution of yams etc., performed during rituals related to spirits of the dead
canoe, hollowed out tree used for hull of a canoe,
